text: Alaha hi hai jihara havavam nu bhejada hai. Isa la'i uha badalam nu uda'undi hai. Phira alaha unham nu jisa tar'ham cahuda hai akasa vica phaila dida hai. Phira uha unham nu lapeta dida hai. Phira tusim dekhade ho, unham vicom kani'am digana lagadi'am hana. Phira uha apani'am badi'am ute jisa nu cahuda hai var'ha dida hai. Tam acanaka uha prasana ho jande hana
